alert.note: Alert for White Mountains and High Terrain South of the Yukon River (Alaska) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued October 20 at 9:15AM AKDT until October 20 at 4:00PM AKDT by NWS Fairbanks
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY IN EFFECT UNTIL 4 PM AKDT THIS AFTERNOON... * WHAT...Blowing snow with low visibility. West winds gusting to 40 mph. Visibility one half mile or less. * WHERE...Over Steese Highway Summits. * WHEN...Until 4 PM AKDT this afternoon. * IMPACTS...Drifting and blowing snow will make travel difficult over Eagle and Twelvemile Summits. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Winds are expected to decrease late this afternoon with visibility improving.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling. The latest road conditions can be obtained by calling 5 1 1.

area.areaDesc: White Mountains and High Terrain South of the Yukon River
